resources.string:
What\'s New with Field Nation

Improved file uploading performance, opening the app from a link, and added the ability to call a work order contact directly from the work order lists.

What we added:
  • Ability to copy/paste on work order messages
  • Profile picture upload enhancements
  • Call a work order contact from the work order lists
Bugs we fixed:
  • Splash screen hanging after clearing data
  • Links to work order details not opening in the app
  • Unable to upload a file
    • On tasks
    • In landscape mode
